meanings.definition: A person who receives benefits, profits, or advantages
meanings.sent1: The lucky beneficiary of the charity event was overjoyed with the gifts.
meanings.sent2: The beneficiary of the scholarship program was able to pursue higher education.
meanings.sent3: The beneficiary of the surprise party was truly caught off guard.
meanings.sent4: She was the beneficiary of his kindness, always receiving help when needed.
meanings.sent5: As the beneficiary of her grandmother's wisdom, she cherished every piece of advice.

meanings.definition: A person who is designated to receive the proceeds of an insurance policy or trust
meanings.sent1: The beneficiary of the life insurance policy was relieved to have financial security.
meanings.sent2: He was named as the beneficiary in his grandfather's will.
meanings.sent3: The beneficiary of the trust fund was surprised by the unexpected windfall.
meanings.sent4: She felt like the beneficiary of a lucky draw when she won the raffle.
meanings.sent5: Being the beneficiary of his mentor's guidance, he excelled in his career.
